participant_2.background:
I have to lose weight so I can ride my horses again.
I have been working at my current job for three years, but my heart is still in the outdoors.
my husband is a pastor.
I love my leather clothes because they make me feel confident and powerful.
i hate flowers.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hey there! I'm just at work, looking forward to going home and riding my horses!
That's cool, I wish I could ride horses. What kind of horses do you have?
I have two horses, a Mustang and a Thoroughbred. They're both beautiful and amazing animals.
I bet they are. I love horses, I just can't ride them. I'm a bit too clumsy.
Well, that's okay. Maybe you can just watch me ride them?
Sure, I'd love that! I'll come by your place sometime soon, and you can show me how it's done.
Sounds great! I'm excited to show you my horses.
Me too! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but my favorite is country music.
Oh, that's cool. I like country music too. Prince was my favorite artist.
I've never heard of Prince. What kind of music does he make?
He's a singer, songwriter, and musician. He's one of the best artists of all time.
I'll have to check him out. I'm always looking for new music.
You should! He's amazing. What do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks, ride my horses, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like great hobbies. I like going for walks too. What's your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I love to go cross-country skiing. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I've never tried cross-country skiing. It sounds fun.
It is! You should try it sometime.
I will! I'm always looking for new things to do.
That's great! I'm glad you're open to new experiences.
Me too! I think it's important to try new things and get out of your comfort zone.
I agree! It's the best way to learn and grow.
I'm glad we agree. I'm excited to try new things and learn new things.
Me too! I think it's going to be a great year.
